import React, { useState } from 'react' import { assets, facilityIcons, Room } from '../assets/assets' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import StarRating from '../components/StarRating' const CheckBox = ({label, selected = false, onChange = () => {}}) => { return ( ) } const RaioButton = ({label, selected = false, onChange = () => {}}) => { return ( ) } const AllRooms = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [openFilters, setOpenFilters] = useState(false) const roomTypes = [ "Lều Đơn", "Lều Đôi", "Lều Gia Đình", ]; const priceRanges = [ '0 to 500', '500 to 1000', '1000 to 2000', '2000 to 3000', ]; const sortOptions = [ "Price Low to High", "Price High to Low", "Newest First", ]; return (
